study_name: CCDI Pediatric In Vivo Testing Program – Neuroblastoma
study_description: Children with disseminated neuroblastoma have a very high risk of treatment failure and death despite receiving intensified chemotherapy, radiation therapy and immunotherapy. The long-term goal of the Mossé and Maris translational research programs is to substantively improve neuroblastoma cure rates by developing patient-specific therapies that target the unique oncogenic drivers of each case.
